name: Joel Ragen Aduma

aboutpara:
I am an accomplished Full Stack Developer with a Bachelor's degree in Applied Computer Technology and over three years of experience in the industry, I am deeply passionate about creating high-quality web products that meet the needs of modern businesses. My core competencies include proficiency in HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, React Native, Node.Js, and Laravel/PHP, and I consistently strive to stay updated with the latest technological advancements in the field.

 I possess extensive experience in collaborating with remote teams across the globe, including those located in Africa and Hong Kong, as a React Frontend Developer as part of multidimensional remote teams.

 With a strong focus on attention to detail and responsive design techniques, I take great pride in delivering exceptional results on every project I undertake.

 My expertise ensures that every webpage and app I work on is both functional and visually appealing, with a strong emphasis on user-friendliness and optimal performance.

If you are seeking a skilled and motivated developer to join your team, I invite you to reach out to me directly. I am always open to new opportunities and eager to contribute to the success of your organization.
